languages.text: {n}Стройные ряды переодетых блюстителей внимают словам исповедника. Подле вас — специально отобранные Иокастой люди, одетые как члены семей офицеров. Ближе всего к вам благостного вида старушка, которая с рассеянной улыбкой мнет накрахмаленный платок. Поймав ваш взгляд, она тепло улыбается полубеззубым ртом и шепчет:{/n} "Все идет как задумано, Ваша Светлость".

{n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Стройные ряды переодетых блюстителей внимают словам исповедника. Подле вас — специально отобранные Иокастой люди, одетые как члены семей офицеров. Ближе всего к вам благостного вида старушка, которая с рассеянной улыбкой мнет накрахмаленный платок. Поймав ваш взгляд, она тепло улыбается полубеззубым ртом и шепчет:{/n} "Все идет как задумано, Ваша Светлость".

All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, all dressed as members of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a half-toothed mouth and whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The rows of disguised enforcers attend to the confessor's words. Jocasta's chosen people, all dressed as members of the officers' families, are seated on the pews all around your person. Closest to you is a kindly-looking old woman who is fumbling with a starched handkerchief. Catching your eye, she smiles with a half-toothed mouth and whispers:{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

Catching your eye, she smiles through a gap-toothed mouth and whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}Die Reihen der verkleideten Enforcer hören dem Konfessor schweigend zu. Um dich herum stehen Sauerbacks auserwählte Leute, alle gekleidet wie Mitglieder der Offiziersfamilien. In der Nähe spielt eine freundlich aussehende alte Frau mit einem gestärkten Taschentuch herum. Als sie deinen Blick bemerkt, lächelt sie zahnlos und flüstert:{/n} "Alles läuft wie geplant, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Reihen der verkleideten Enforcer hören dem Konfessor schweigend zu. Um dich herum stehen Sauerbacks auserwählte Leute, alle gekleidet wie Mitglieder der Offiziersfamilien. In der Nähe spielt eine freundlich aussehende alte Frau mit einem gestärkten Taschentuch herum. Als sie deinen Blick bemerkt, lächelt sie zahnlos und flüstert:{/n} "Alles läuft wie geplant, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Los guardias disfrazados escuchan las palabras del confesor en completo silencio. Estás {mf|rodeado|rodeada} por los elegidos de Sauerback, que se hacen pasar por familiares de los oficiales. Cerca de ti hay una anciana de aspecto afable que manosea torpemente un pañuelo almidonado. Cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan, te sonríe con su boca medio desdentada y susurra:{/n} «Todo va según lo planeado, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los guardias disfrazados escuchan las palabras del confesor en completo silencio. Estás {mf|rodeado|rodeada} por los elegidos de Sauerback, que se hacen pasar por familiares de los oficiales. Cerca de ti hay una anciana de aspecto afable que manosea torpemente un pañuelo almidonado. Cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan, te sonríe con su boca medio desdentada y susurra:{/n} «Todo va según lo planeado, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}列になった変装中のエンフォーサーが、黙って聴罪師の言葉に耳を傾けている。周りにいるのはザウアーバックに選ばれた者達のみで、みな士官の家族の一員に扮していた。その近くで、優しそうな老婆がパリパリのハンカチを手でいじっている。こちらの視線に気づいた老婆は、歯が半分しかない口を開いて微笑み、ヒソヒソと囁いた。{/n}「すべては計画通りに進んでいます、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}列になった変装中のエンフォーサーが、黙って聴罪師の言葉に耳を傾けている。周りにいるのはザウアーバックに選ばれた者達のみで、みな士官の家族の一員に扮していた。その近くで、優しそうな老婆がパリパリのハンカチを手でいじっている。こちらの視線に気づいた老婆は、歯が半分しかない口を開いて微笑み、ヒソヒソと囁いた。{/n}「すべては計画通りに進んでいます、陛下」

languages.text: {n}一排排乔装打扮的执法者正静静地聆听着告解神父的布道。你身边都是苏尔贝克精挑细选出来的人，所有人都打扮成了军官家属的模样。不远处，一位慈眉善目的老妇人正摆弄着手中浆过的手帕。留意到你的目光之后，她咧开了嘴，嘴里一半的牙齿已经掉光了。她低声开了口。{/n}“一切都在按计划进行，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}一排排乔装打扮的执法者正静静地聆听着告解神父的布道。你身边都是苏尔贝克精挑细选出来的人，所有人都打扮成了军官家属的模样。不远处，一位慈眉善目的老妇人正摆弄着手中浆过的手帕。留意到你的目光之后，她咧开了嘴，嘴里一半的牙齿已经掉光了。她低声开了口。{/n}“一切都在按计划进行，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Les rangs de prévôts en civil écoutent silencieusement les paroles de leur confesseur. Tous les individus choisis par Sauerback sont vêtus à la façon des membres de familles d'officiers. Près de vous, une vieille dame à l'air aimable tripote un mouchoir amidonné. Croisant votre regard, elle sourit de sa bouche édentée et vous murmure :{/n} « Tout se déroule comme prévu, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les rangs de prévôts en civil écoutent silencieusement les paroles de leur confesseur. Tous les individus choisis par Sauerback sont vêtus à la façon des membres de familles d'officiers. Près de vous, une vieille dame à l'air aimable tripote un mouchoir amidonné. Croisant votre regard, elle sourit de sa bouche édentée et vous murmure :{/n} « Tout se déroule comme prévu, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Kılık değiştirmiş sıra sıra infazcı, günah çıkarıcının sözlerini sessizlik içinde dinliyor. Etrafını yalnızca Sauerback'in seçtiği insanlar sarıyor. Hepsi, subay ailelerinin birer ferdi olarak giyinmiş. Yanı başında duran nazik görünümlü yaşlı kadın, sert bir mendille yüzünü siliyor. Dişlerinin yarısı dökülmüş ağzındaki gülümseme, gözüne takılıyor. Ardından fısıldayarak konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Her şey planlandığı gibi gidiyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The rows of disguised enforcers are listening to the confessor's words in silence. All around you are Sauerback's chosen people, each dressed as a member of the officers' families. Close by, a kindly-looking old woman is fumbling with a starched handkercher. Catching your eye, she smiles with a mouth that is missing half its teeth, then whispers,{/n} "Everything is going as planned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
